item.title: Cheap WebHosting
item.description:
Cheap Domain Web Hosting.

Since I’m lucky enough to own my own domain I need to go through the hassle of hosting it. I used to use a friend’s webhosting service but with GitHub offering free static WebHosting (which is more then enough for my needs) and Microsoft at the time I started where offering free mail hosting I decided to switch.

This still leaves the need for two services.

  1. Web Registration (I use Hostway randomly as they are cheap) and
  2. Domain Name Service (DNS)

These are my notes about cheap domain name service. I decided to use FreeDNS’s premium service for i$30/year. They do offer a free service as well but that makes your domain public something I’m not interested in. $30/year gives me one stealth domain under my control with 25 subdomains which for my needs should be plenty. After paying I was not directly given the ability to register my domain as a stealth domain (only public and private). Decided to hold off until Monday to see what will happen.
